column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute is a world class museum. Having visited countless art collections in London
column4: I'm still impressed by this collection in our own back yard. Sometimes you just have to take time to be a tourist in your own city and for the month of February the Art Institute is helping you do just that
column5: because it's free! So let's put on our black turtle necks
column6: horn rimmed glasses and berets and take a tour!
